name: Tales of Aetherial
description:
TALES OF AETHERIAL

The story follows a Demi God named Myurk who has become fed up with the way that Earth has turned out after humanity has been slowly destroying their world over several thousands of years. He decides to instead travel to a world that he had created a long time ago thinking it was a better place than Earth. Upon his arrival in Gaia he discovers that a lot is afoot in this world he wished would be paradise, and has found himself locked in a sibling conflict. With the help of the friends you make along the way, you travel through the immerse and enthralling world to become a top ranked adventurer, take on dark forces and discover the mysteries the world has to offer.

PC Demo releases 11-27-20 for Patreons and will be priced on here the same. The free public demo will be available 12-4-20 and price will be removed on here on that date.

https://www.patreon.com/aetherial

Demo is currently available exclusively on PS4 with RPG Maker Player (free game/app in the PlayStation store), where you can play the most recent builds for free. 
This project WILL be a full length title RPG consisting of a minimum 40+ hour story, many side quests, in depth story and characters that you will grow to love.
